tossup_question: -   –  Consider two lists of numbers, A and B, each with mean 10, that have a correlation coefficient r equal to 0.5. If all members of A are multiplied by 4 and all members of B are reduced by 7, what is the value of r for the two new lists?
bonus_question: -   –  Simplify cosine open parenthesis x + pi/3 close parenthesis + sine open parenthesis x + pi/6 close parenthesis.
